summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3813 for the improvement of the alley in block 49, Davis S. Maynard's Plat, being the alley between Maynard Street and 7th Avenue South, from King Street to Weller Street, by paving and grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46905, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
